abstract: The 20th Century Fox Television studio appeared to confirm a standoff with the voice actors of "The Simpsons," saying that it "cannot produce future seasons under its current financial model."
snippet: The 20th Century Fox Television studio appeared to confirm a standoff with the voice actors of "The Simpsons," saying that it "cannot produce future seasons under its current financial model."

headline.main: Dispute Over 'Simpsons' Actors' Salaries Could Halt Series
